name: EasyOpts
summary: Help other scripts in the option management
description:
EasyOpts simplify the options management to other plugins through some facilities:
 - allow the plugin to initialize all the user-exposed variables to a predefined value (if not already specified).
 - allow the user to change the option values through a simple menu
 - check if the values specified by the user are correct

Full documentation about how to use the plugin is provided in the help file and is demoed through some examples
install_details: Copy the content of the doc/ and plugins/ directory in their equivalent inside the .vim folder.

versions.release_notes: The user now could use the EasyOpts Menu to save the options or restore them to the default value. Fixed a bug in the EasyOpts_Menu_Close() functions.
